entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Hello and welcome to my personal blog! I'm Enkhtur Enkhbat, a software developer passionate about creating innovative solutions and sharing knowledge with the tech community.
entry.content:
Hello and welcome to my personal blog! I'm Enkhtur Enkhbat, a software developer passionate about creating innovative solutions and sharing knowledge with the tech community.

What to Expect​

This blog will be a space where I share:

  • Technical tutorials and guides
  • Insights from my software development journey
  • Thoughts on technology and industry trends
  • Personal projects and experiences

About Me​

I'm a Senior Software Developer with experience in full-stack development, working primarily with:

  • Frontend: React, Angular, TypeScript
  • Backend: Node.js
  • Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
  • DevOps: Docker, GitHub Actions

Stay Connected​

Feel free to connect with me on:

  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn
  • Email

I'm excited to share my knowledge and experiences with you. Stay tuned for more content!
